scripts.serve: serve & node_modules/.bin/watchify --entry sherpa.module.js -o bundle.js & node-sass -w css/styles.scss css/styles.css
scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/browserify --entry sherpa.module.js -o bundle.js & node-sass css/styles.scss css/styles.css
scripts.java: node_modules/.bin/watchify --entry sherpa.module.js -o bundle.js & node-sass -w css/styles.scss css/styles.css & cd .. && java -jar HolyCitySherpa-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/watchify --entry sherpa.module.js -o bundle.js & node-sass -w css/styles.scss css/styles.css & cd .. && java -jar SherpaTest-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
